name: ttc-service-map
description: A network status map for the Toronto Transit Commission.
author: Andrew F. Ilersich <andrew.ilersich@mail.utoronto.ca> (https://www.ilersich.com/)

scripts.dev: cd build && npx wrangler pages dev ./public
scripts.prebuild: npm run db:genTypes && npm run pb:generate
scripts.db:init:local: npm run db:genInitScript && npx wrangler d1 execute ttcmapdb --local --file=./prisma/migrations/init.sql
scripts.db:update: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:genTypes
scripts.db:rebuild: npx prisma migrate reset && npm run db:update
scripts.pb:generate: npx pbjs --keep-case -t static-module -w es6 -o generated/gtfs-realtime.js gtfs-realtime.proto && npx pbts -o generated/gtfs-realtime.d.ts generated/gtfs-realtime.js
